physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 6 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Allied - Women meet at 200 S. Grape; Mar 24. 71; Front L. to R.; Mrs. Gerson Radetsky, Mrs. Martin Trotsky, Mrs. Noah Fine, Mrs. Harold Pringle, Mrs. Isadore Greenblatt; Back L. to R. Mrs. Marvin Wolf, Mrs. Sam Mandelbaum, Mrs. H. Harold Friedman, Mrs. Abe Wolpo.''

mods.abstract: Nine women, members of the Allied Jewish Federation, pose together at an Allied event. Front row left to right Mrs. Gerson Radetsky (Jeanne), Mrs. Martin Trotsky (Gloria), Mrs. Noah Fine (Sylvia), Mrs. Harold Pringle (Shirley), and Mrs. Isadore Greenblatt (Rose) and back row left to right Mrs. Marvin Wolf (Mae), Mrs. Sam Mandelbaum (Evelyn), Mrs. H. Harold Friedman (Charlotte), and Mrs. Abe Wolpo.
